articles.title: Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
articles.content:
Greetings to First Vice-President of Iran
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Eshaq Jahangiri on his reappointment as first vice-president of Iran.
					 The message wished the first vice-president bigger success in his work for the independent development and prosperity of the country and the friendly government and people of Iran happiness and prosperity.
					
					 On the same day, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho sent a similar message to Mohammad Javad Zarif on his reappointment as foreign minister of Iran.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Clarifies Its Stand at Geneva Disarmament Conference
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Clarifies Its Stand at Geneva Disarmament Conference
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation clarified the following principled stand as regards the on-going U.S.-south Korea joint military drill against the DPRK at the third session of the Geneva Disarmament Conference on August 22:
					 The root cause of the nuclear issue that spawned on the Korean peninsula and the vicious cycle of tensions lies in the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat against the DPRK.
					
					 In order to ease the tension and avert dangerous military conflict on the Korean peninsula and in the region, the U.S. should first take a right choice and prove it in action as it introduced lots of nuclear strategic assets around the Korean peninsula and caused a troublesome situation.
					
					 But the U.S. and south Korea started the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercise on August 21 by mobilizing lethal war equipment deployed in the U.S. mainland and Pacific operational theatre and the armed forces of seven satellite countries despite our repeated warnings.
					
					 The focus of the rehearsal is on the drill for "beheading operation" and "secret operation" to "remove" the supreme headquarters of the DPRK and one for countering the DPRK's ballistic rockets under OPLAN 5015, an aggressive war scenario to carry out preemptive strike against the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that its military pressure and sanctions are becoming the driving power bolstering the DPRK's nuclear force instead.
					
					 Unless a definite end is put to the U.S. hostile policy and nuclear threat, the DPRK will never flinch even an inch from the road of bolstering up the nuclear forces already chosen by itself.

articles.title: Delegation of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Leaves
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification led by Vice-Chairman Kang Thae Hwan left here on Friday.

articles.title: Senior Party, State Officials Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Senior Party, State Officials Visit Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Senior party and state officials and the chairman of a friendly party and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum Friday, the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					 Among the visitors were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Choe Ryong Hae and other leading officials of the party and state and officials of the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung waving back to columns of the military parade at the square celebrating the victory in the war.
					
					 They went round historic relics and things on display at the hall for victory in the Songun revolution, which show the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits performed by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons of the Korean People's Army (KPA) and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces (KPISF), people from all walks of life and school youth and children visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of Songun.
					 Seen standing before the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill was a floral basket from Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid at the statues were floral baskets in the names of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, units of the KPA and the KPISF and institutions, industrial establishments and schools in Pyongyang. Bouquets and flowers were also placed there.
					
					 Laid there was a floral basket in the name of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 The participants paid tribute to the peerlessly great men before their statues.
					
					 Floral baskets were also placed before the statues of the great leaders at Kim Il Sung University, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of People's Security, the Mansudae Art Studio and other parts in Pyongyang.
					
					 Servicepersons, civilians and school youth and children across the country visited the statues and portraits of the smiling great leaders in their residential areas to pay tribute to them.

articles.title: DPRK Celebrates Songun Day
articles.content:
DPRK Celebrates Songun Day
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK significantly celebrated the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 An endless stream of people visited the plaza in front of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of Juche, where President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il lie in state.
					
					 The visitors paid tribute to the portraits of the smiling great leaders at the park of the plaza.
					
					 Visiting the great leaders' statues on Mansu Hill and in other different parts of the country and the portraits of the smiling great leaders in every part of the country, the working people and school youths and children hardened their will to add luster to the Songun revolutionary feats of the peerlessly great men for all ages.
					
					 Art performances were given at the Moranbong Theatre, the Pyongyang Grand Theatre, the National Theatre and the Ponghwa Art Theatre.
					
					 Circus shows were given at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the Magic Theater of the National Acrobatic Troupe to please service personnel and working people.
					
					 Art performances were given by artistes of the provincial art troupes at theaters and plazas across the country including South and North Phyongan Provinces, South Hwanghae Province, Jagang Province and South and North Hamgyong Provinces.
					
					 Dancing parties of youth and students in different parts of the country revved up the atmosphere of the holiday.

articles.title: Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Celebrate Day of Songun
articles.content:
Dancing Parties of Youths and Students Celebrate Day of Songun
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youths and students were held in different parts of the country Friday, the 57th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 With the play of song "Long Live Great Illustrious Commander of Songun", there presented the sea of dancers at dancing party venues in the capital city including the plazas of the Monument to Party Founding and the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium.
					
					 The youths and students danced, keenly realizing that thanks to Kim Jong Il's unique Songun politics, the DPRK turned into an invincible political and military power dignified with independence and strong with self-reliance in national defence, and that there provided the eternal foundations for building a prosperous country.
					
					 Reverence for respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un pervaded the dancing venues, the man successfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary leadership that started on Mt Paektu and making the DPRK demonstrate its might as a nuclear power of Juche and a world-level military power. 
					
					 Songs reflecting the spirit of the masters of the Paektusan youth power, who are dashing straight along the road indicated by the Party, added to the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					 There were also similar dancing parties in provincial seats on the same day.

articles.title: DPRK Players Win More Gold Medals in 29th Summer Universiad
articles.content:
DPRK Players Win More Gold Medals in 29th Summer Universiad
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- DPRK players bagged gold medals again in the weightlifting and diving events of the 29th Summer Universiad held on August 24.
					 Rim Jong Sim took the first place in the women's weightlifting 75kg with lift of 115kg in the snatch and 145kg in the jerk.
					
					 Kim Kuk Hyang and Hyon Il Myong placed first at the 10 meters mixed synchro platform diving, outmatching their Russian and American rivals.

articles.title: Men's Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
articles.content:
Men's Premier Soccer League for Torch Cup in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The men's premier soccer league for Torch Cup, which started at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang on July 27, reaches its final stage.
					 As the April 25 team, winner of the rotating trophy cup for four consecutive years, participates in the 2017 AFC Cup, this season will witness a new victor.
					
					 The Ryomyong and Hwaebul teams secured the first and second places in A group and the Sobaeksu and Kigwancha teams in B group respectively.
					
					 In the semi-finals held on August 23, the Ryomyong team defeated the Kigwancha team by 5:3 and the Sobaeksu team the Hwaebul team by 10:9.
					
					 The final is slated for August 28, the Youth Day of the country.

articles.title: National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Machine-building Industry Field
articles.content:
National Sci-Tech Presentation in Field of Machine-building Industry Field
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- A national sci-tech presentation in the field of machine-building industry was held at the Taean Heavy Machine Complex on Aug. 24 under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 It brought together scientists, technicians, teachers, researchers of the Central Machine Designing Institute, Kim Chaek University of Technology, the Mechanical Engineering Institute and Welding Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, and field officials.
					
					 More than 80 papers were presented. 
					
					 The purpose of the presentation was to widely disseminate the scientific and technological achievements made in developing machine industry at a rapid pace and stepping up the modernization of machine factories.
					
					 The participants introduced achievements made in the course of solving scientific and technological problems arising in ensuring the production of quality machines and equipment of new types and improving their performance, and exchanged experiences gained.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building Self-defensive Nuclear Deterrent
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats in Building Self-defensive Nuclear Deterrent
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the Day of Songun (August 25), the people in the DPRK are recollecting the immortal feats leader Kim Jong Il performed in building self-defensive nuclear deterrent with his Songun (military first) leadership.
					 In the 1990s, the U.S. and its servile forces remained persistent in their military moves to stamp out the DPRK, which is unhesitatingly advancing along the road of independence and socialism, and put pressure upon it in all fields including politics, economy, ideology, culture and diplomacy.
					
					 But, the DPRK has emerged as a military giant, thanks to the steadfast will and energetic guidance of Kim Jong Il to strengthen the national defense capabilities at any cost.
					
					 Based on its own military muscle, the DPRK has resolutely smashed the ever-growing military oppression and moves of aggression perpetrated by the U.S. and its servile forces.
					
					 After the appearance of the Bush administration, the U.S. termed the DPRK an "axis of evil" and listed it as one of targets for preemptive nuclear attack, while escalating nuclear war drills. 
					
					 Under these circumstances, Kim Jong Il made a strategic bold decision to counter the enemy's nuke with nuke.
					
					 The DPRK government took a measure to withdraw from the Non-proliferation Treaty on January 10, Juche 92 (2003). Later, it conducted the first underground nuclear test in October 2006 and the second in May 2009.
					
					 If the DPRK was downed by nuclear threats of the U.S., the tragedies of Iraq and Libya would have been repeated on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Indeed, it is the greatest feats of leader Kim Jong Il that built a self-defensive military force with the nuclear deterrent as its mainstay.

articles.title: Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary History
articles.content:
Papers Praise Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary History
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers here Friday dedicate editorials to the Day of Songun when leader Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The papers say that nuclear power of Juche, the world-level military power is the brilliant fruition of the Songun revolutionary idea and the Songun revolutionary line of Kim Jong Il, and the immense pride of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun praises the exploits performed by Kim Jong Il under the banner of Songun as extraordinary ones of huge significance in accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence and the socialist cause, and ones which guarantee the eternal future of the Juche revolution and the prosperity of posterity to come.
					
					 It continues:
					
					 Kim Jong Il formulated, systematized and developed in depth the Songun revolutionary idea and formulated the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism by organically combining the military with politics. This is the greatest exploit which will shine long in history.
					
					 He built the invincible military capabilities for self-defence with the nuclear force as a pivot with his strong pluck and superhuman energy. This was a driving force that brought about consecutive victories in the nuclear stand-off with the U.S.
					
					 The faith in Juche and the strong spirit of independence run through his Songun leadership.
					
					 His Songun revolutionary exploits are shining as the eternal treasure of the Korean revolution and the building of a socialist power thanks to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Thanks to him, the history of Kim Jong Il's Songun revolution will be given a steady continuity century after century.
					
					 Minju Joson also calls on all the officials and working people to firmly arm themselves with the Songun revolutionary idea of Kim Jong Il and glorify his Songun revolutionary records generation after generation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Is Driving Force to Usher in New Era of Victory, Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Songun Leadership Is Driving Force to Usher in New Era of Victory, Prosperity: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Today is the anniversary of the publication of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution."
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il, the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks to successfully accomplish the cause of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday dedicates an article to the anniversary.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's Songun leadership is not only the brilliant succession to leadership mode of the great leaders but also a driving force to make it possible to achieve a greater victory and make a greater leap forward.
					
					 His Songun leadership is also an ever-victorious banner to make it possible for the DPRK to demonstrate its might as the world's military power which no formidable enemy dares to provoke.
					
					 The "March 18 revolution", "July 4 revolution" and the great victory on July 28 were achieved in the national defense field, which made the DPRK emerge as a nuclear power of Juche and the world's military power. 
					
					 This is a precious fruition of the outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un ushering in the greatest heyday of bolstering up the military capabilities.
					
					 He had the Party's monolithic leadership for the revolutionary armed forces realized thoroughly and energetically led the work to make the People's Army take the lead in the campaign to defend and serve the people.
					
					 This is of great significance in firmly guaranteeing monolithic ideology and leadership within the whole Party and making it full of the people-first idea and the trait of devotedly serving the people.
					
					 His Songun leadership serves as a driving force to make it possible to vigorously create the Mallima speed and make a great leap forward on all fronts of building up a powerful socialist country.
					
					 His Songun leadership is a basic source through which to bring about the great era of struggle and change, the great era of Mallima, on this land.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Face up to Trend of Times
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges U.S. to Face up to Trend of Times
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is expecting some "change" in the DPRK after fabricating the unprecedented harsh "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK by abusing the UN Security Council.
					 Meantime, it is trumpeting about a sort of military option, a revelation of U.S.-style ferocity and aggressive nature as well as the lack of judgment and extreme recklessness.
					
					 World media vie with each other to report that sanctions on the DPRK will not prove effective, the U.S. military attack will fail and the DPRK's victory in the nuclear stand-off with the U.S. is already set.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary says in this regard:
					
					 There are ample reasons why world media are critical of the anachronistic nature of the U.S. frantic anti-DPRK sanctions racket and reckless military acts while getting certain about the victory of the DPRK.
					
					 The sanctions racket against the DPRK has already proven ineffective through history and reality. The U.S. racket for putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK with an aim at violating the sovereignty of the country and the right to existence of its people is barbarous and brutal unprecedented in history.
					
					 But the army and people of the DPRK rendered the U.S. and its vassal forces' sanctions racket futile. It is because they have the might to do so. That might is precisely the self-development-first spirit and the single-minded unity of the army and people that can not be found in any other parts of the world. With this great might the DPRK made A-bomb and H-bomb and creatively developed and completed the most powerful ICBM, thus realizing the cherished desire of the nation with history spanning five thousand years.
					
					 The rhetoric about the military option spelled by the Trump group is nothing but an expression of a rash act inviting self-destruction.
					
					 The media comment Trump's mouth is a greater threat to the U.S. than the nuclear weapons of the DPRK and that the Trump administration is isolating the U.S., not the DPRK. This is a proper comment.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Danger of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Danger of U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers started Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercisers for invading the DPRK on August 21.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday in a commentary terms this a clear indication of the attempt to mount a preemptive attack on the north and an unpardonable provocation against it.
					
					 The warmongers at home and abroad are veiling the Ulji Freedom Guardian military exercises as "annual" ones just as they used to do in the past, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 But with nothing can the U.S. and the puppet warmongers cover up the aggressive and provocative nature of the joint military exercises.
					
					 The exercises are the ones for a war of aggression for mounting a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK from all aspects. A clear proof is that OPLAN 5015 has been applied to the exercises this time.
					
					 OPLAN 5015 is a hideous preemptive strike scenario focusing on the "precision strike" at the supreme headquarters and major strategic strongholds of the DPRK.
					
					 The warmongers at home and abroad are working hard to master and perfect the performance procedures and the actual maneuverability of "beheading operation" and "secret operation" under OPLAN 5015. This clearly proves the nature of the U.S. and the puppet warmongers who work hard to stifle the DPRK in a military way even though they talk about "annual" and "defensive".
					
					 It is a very ill-boding development that timed to coincide with the exercises, the U.S. Pacific Command chief, the U.S. Strategic Command head, the Missile Defense Agency director and other U.S. high-ranking military officers flew into south Korea to hold confabs against the DPRK.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. and the warmongers' scenario for provoking a nuclear war against the north has reached the phase of implementation.

articles.title: U.S., Vassal Forces Are Responsible for Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula: Institute of Int'l Studies of Korea
articles.content:
U.S., Vassal Forces Are Responsible for Escalating Tensions on Korean Peninsula: Institute of Int'l Studies of Korea
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Jong Myong Chol, doctor of the Institute of International Studies of Korea, released an article titled "Blurred eyes of discerning truth will lead to injustice lording it over".
					 The author in the article dealt with the heated-up controversy in some parts of the world over the responsibility for the situation on the Korean peninsula turning worse.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces stress that Korea is liable for the situation on the Korean peninsula inching close to a war phase.
					
					 Some big powers around Korea are asserting that both the DPRK and the U.S. are to blame for the current aggravated situation on the peninsula.
					
					 But the DPRK is strong and firm in its stand that the responsibility for the current tense situation entirely rests with the U.S. and its vassal forces.
					
					 Then there arises the need to look with coolness into who is right and who is not.
					
					 To judge whether these statements are correct; 
					
					 First, it is necessary to study the historical origin which led the Korean peninsula to the present tension.
					
					 The aggravation of the tension on the Korean peninsula, the world's biggest hotspot, started along with the demise of the Second World War at the time of which the U.S. and a few other big powers divided this country into two.
					
					 The DPRK was neither a war criminal state nor a war defeated state like Germany and Japan.
					
					 But the U.S. built an artificial wall called the military demarcation line along the 38th parallel at its will in violation of the Korean people's desire for new society and new life, and occupied half of the land in an illegal way.
					
					 It fabricated the puppet regime with its hand-raised stooges and egged them on to military provocation against their fellow countrymen. It even ignited the war of aggression against the north and openly disclosed its intention to use A-bomb against the north.
					
					 In the postwar period, far from drawing a lesson from its big defeat in the war of aggression, the U.S. introduced tens of thousands of aggression troops and thousands of nuclear weapons into south Korea and has since watched for an every opportunity to invade the north.
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. has been branded as a chief criminal that pushed the DPRK into having an access to nukes and a bellicose state which has constantly kept the situation on the Korean peninsula at a tense phase.
					
					 Second, it is imperative to have an insightful look into the present situation on the Korean peninsula with an objective and unbiased eye.
					
					 The U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail targeting Pyongyang have lasted for decades.
					
					 Under such situation the Korean people could not but opt for building a nuclear force to defend themselves.
					
					 It was ultimately the U.S. which forced the DPRK to take a resolute step of examining the proposal for enveloping strike on Guam.
					
					 Despite the touch-and-go situation on the peninsula, the U.S. began Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises against the DPRK again together with the puppet military warmongers on Monday.
					
					 If the DPRK staged huge military exercises regardless of time just at the doorstep of the U.S. with the mobilization of nuclear strategic means, would the U.S. remain with its arms folded.
					
					 Third, it is necessary to have a close look at the biased conduct observed on the international arena over the issue of the Korean peninsula on which the world attention is focused.
					
					 Seen on the international arena including UN are such happenings in which the U.S. assertions that the DPRK makes new "provocation" through nuclear test and missile launch and threatens the regional security are just parroted as they are and public opinion is built over it and sanctions resolutions are hastily adopted pursuant to the assertion all the while the truth about the afore-mentioned historical origin which led to the tension on the peninsula and the truth about the present situation remain unseen.
					
					 Even some big neighboring countries which used to maintain principle at the UN arena with their own view in the past now lie down flat before the U.S., frightened by its high-handed practices and bluffing.
					
					 History still remembers fresh what strenuous efforts they made to develop nuclear weapons and what a high price these countries paid, finding themselves unable to stand the U.S. high-handed practices, pressure and contempt any more.
					
					 No wonder, there were mentioned such words that the cherished desire of "A-bomb, H-bomb and artificial satellite" has to be realized even though one's trousers are held mortgage and even just a half out of the country's population numbering hundreds of millions survive.
					
					 The DPRK extended full support and encouragement to the country when it was covering the arduous path beyond all descriptions under such a pressure of the West including the U.S.
					
					 Those big neighboring countries are now doggedly standing in the way of the DPRK in bolstering its nuclear force for self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear blackmail and threat. This reminds one of a saying which goes "Vows made in storms are forgotten in calms". They are even unhesitatingly joining in the U.S. sanctions and pressure. Wherever can their face, conscience and good faith be found?
					
					 The unreasonable conducts of big neighboring countries actively pursuing the U.S., while yielding to the UN and U.S. high-handed practices by which they do not hesitate to cook up a criminal document of branding injustice as justice without objectivity and impartiality are quite enough to explain the situation on the Korean peninsula getting tenser and tenser.
					
					 Whoever with clear sight capable of discerning the truth can easily judge who is responsible for the tense situation on the peninsula and will be able to discern correctness from falsity out of many assertions.
					
					 The U.S. deplorable plight by which it is finding itself plunging into the pitfall it dug itself while getting recklessly keen on the moves for stifling the DPRK speaks volumes.
					
					 Should the U.S. fail to draw a lesson from it and persist in reckless gambling, it will find itself getting deeper into the abyss of tragic end.
					
					 Those forces currying favor with the U.S. should not regard it as just the fate of the other.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces had better face up to the trend of the times and behave with discretion.

articles.title: Removal of Tensions on Korean Peninsula Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Removal of Tensions on Korean Peninsula Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Ansan Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference outside the Ansan City Hall in Kyonggi Province on Aug. 21 to denounce the reckless war drills targeting the north staged by the U.S. imperialists and the puppet war maniacs, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 Speakers said that the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military war exercises are to launch a preemptive attack upon the north, though the drill is described as "defensive".

articles.title: S. Korean Trade Union Organizations Demand Guarantee of Right of Trade Union Movement
articles.content:
S. Korean Trade Union Organizations Demand Guarantee of Right of Trade Union Movement
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 22 demanding the guarantee of the right of the trade union movement, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers demanded the authorities immediately start the procedure for ratifying core conventions of the International Labor Organization and opt for examining laws and systems that fall foul of the conventions and revising relevant laws.

articles.title: Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Distributed as UN Document
articles.content:
Statement of Spokesman for KPA General Staff Distributed as UN Document
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) to clarify the resolute stand to mercilessly smash the war hysteria of the U.S. going extremely reckless at a time when the UNSC fabricated the anti-DPRK "sanctions resolution" was distributed as an official document A/71/1021-S/2017/699 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on August 18.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- The full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was posted on a website of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 21, ahead of the Day of Songun.
					 The work, published on Aug. 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary exploits of leader Kim Jong Il and the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and indicates the tasks for successfully accomplishing the cause of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 25 (KCNA) -- Seminars, remembrance meetings, book exhibitions and film shows were held in Thailand, Russia and Nigeria between August 6 and 15 to mark the 72nd anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 On display at the book exhibitions were books, magazines and newspapers dealing with exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the successes made by the Korean army and people in building a powerful socialist nation under the leadership of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean films "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang Today" were shown.
					
					 The chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand praised Kim Il Sung as the ardent patriot who built a socialist bulwark, laid firm foundations for building a power and devoted his all to the country and its people.
					
					 Daughters of internationalist soldier Ya. T. Nobichenko said at the remembrance meeting held in Novosibirsk of Russia that Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un bestowed warm love and care on her father, calling him internationalist soldier, stressing that they would always remember the loving care generation after generation.
					
					 Personages of various strata from Zamfara, Enugu and other states of Nigeria paid tribute to Kim Il Sung who made tremendous contributions to the independent development of African countries, saying that his exploits would always be remembered by the Korean people and world progressives as the benefactor of Korea's liberation.

articles.title: Delegacion coreana expone en Ginebra la posicion de principios de la RPDC
articles.content:
Delegacion coreana expone en Ginebra la posicion de principios de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- En relacion con el despliegue de los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU. -Sudcorea contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la delegacion coreana manifesto el dia 22 en el pleno de la tercera sesion de la Conferencia de Ginebra sobre el Desarme la siguiente posicion de principios:
					La causa de surgimiento del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana y de continuacion del circulo vicioso de agravacion de la situacion esta en la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y su amenaza nuclear. 
					
					Para relajar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y prevenir el peligroso choque militar, es preciso que EE.UU. tome primero la opcion correcta y la muestre con accion porque el busco el problema introduciendo muchos equipos estrategicos nucleares en los alrededores de la RPDC.
					
					A pesar de las advertencias repetidas de la RPDC, EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea iniciaron el entrenamiento militar conjunto "Ulji Freedom Guardian" movilizando los armamentos mortiferos desplegados en el territorio estadounidense y en la zona operacional del Pacifico y el gran numero de fuerzas agresoras, inclusive los efectivos de 7 paises satelites.
					
					En virtud del "OPLAN 5015", plan de ataque preventivo anti-RPDC, la presente edicion de UFG se enfoca en la "operacion de descabezamiento" y "la secreta" para "eliminar" la Direccion Suprema de la RPDC y en el ejercicio de enfrentamiento al cohete balistico norcoreano.
					
					EE.UU. debe tener bien presente que su presion militar o campana de sancion y aplastamiento deviene la fuerza motriz que empuja a la RPDC al incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					Mientras no se eliminen radicalmente la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU., no retrocederemos ni un paso de nuestro camino escogido hacia la consolidacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.

articles.title: Coreanos celebran con solemnidad el Dia del Songun
articles.content:
Coreanos celebran con solemnidad el Dia del Songun
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles coreanos festejaron el aniversario 57 del inicio de la orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun.
					Concurrio mucha gente a la plaza del Palacio del Sol Kumsusan, lugar sagrado del Juche, donde estan conservados los cuerpos del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					En el parque de la plaza, la multitud rindio homenaje a los lideres antecesores ante sus retratos con amplia sonrisa.
					
					Al pie de las estatuas de bronce y los murales con imagenes sonrientes del Presidente y el Dirigente levantados en la colina Mansu y otros lugares, los oficiales, trabajadores de diversos estratos, jovenes y estudiantes redoblaron la decision de glorificar para siempre sus proezas revolucionarias del Songun.
					
					En el Teatro Moranbong, el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang, el Teatro Nacional de Drama y el Teatro de Arte Ponghwa en esta capital se ofrecieron las funciones artisticas dedicadas a la efemeride.
					
					Los uniformados y trabajadores pasaron ratos alegres presenciando los espectaculos de circo y magia en el Circo de Pyongyang y en el Teatro de Magia del Conjunto Circense Nacional.
					
					Tuvieron lugar las funciones de festejo de los conjuntos artisticos provinciales en el teatro y plazas de varias localidades, entre otras, las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, Phyong-an del Norte, Hwanghae del Sur, Jagang, Hamgyong del Norte y Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					Este dia, se efectuaron los bailes de jovenes y estudiantes en diferentes localidades llevando al climax la atmosfera de fiesta.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun se refiere a la peligrosidad de "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun se refiere a la peligrosidad de "Ulji Freedom Guardian"
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los belicistas de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea comenzaron el dia 21 los ejercicios militares conjuntos Ulji Freedom Guardian para agredir la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En un comentario individual del dia 25, el diario Rodong Sinmun lo condeno como provocacion intolerable calificandolo del intento de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					Como de costumbre, los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos abogan esta vez tambien ese simulacro militar con la mascara "anual", pero no pueden ocultar con nada el caracter agresivo y provocativo de Ulji Freedom Guardian, critica el comentarista y continua:
					
					Este simulacro militar es de punta a cabo los ejercicios de guerra agresiva para dar ataque preventivo a la RPDC. Esto se testimonia por el hecho de que en esos entrenamientos se aplica el "OPLAN 5015", guion de golpe preventivo para dar el "ataque de precision" a la Direccion Suprema y los puntos estrategicos importantes de la RPDC.
					
					De acuerdo con el guion en cuestion, esos belicistas se enfrascan en los ejercicios para adiestrar y perfeccionar los procesos de cumplimiento y la capacidad de accion real de la "operacion de descabezamiento" y la "operacion secreta". 
					
					Esto revela la falsedad de la insistencia de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea en el caracter "anual" y el "defensivo".
					
					Por otra parte, las figuras de alto rango de la capa militar estadounidense, entre ellas, el comandante de las fuerzas en el Pacifico, el comandante de las fuerzas estrategicas y el director de Defensa Antimisiles, arriban al Sur de Corea para efectuar conspiraciones.
					
					La realidad demuestra que ya llegan a la fase de practica las intrigas de provocacion de guerra anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.

articles.title: EE.UU. y sus satelites son responsables de la tensa situacion actual, opina doctor coreano
articles.content:
EE.UU. y sus satelites son responsables de la tensa situacion actual, opina doctor coreano
Pyongyang, 25 de agosto (ACNC) -- El Dr. Jong Myong Chol del Instituto de Estudio de los Asuntos Internacionales de la RPDC publico el dia 24 un articulo titulado "Si se hace turbia la vision sobre la verdad, prevalecera la injusticia".
					 En unas partes del mundo se entablan ahora acalorados debates sobre la responsabilidad de la situacion actual de la Peninsula Coreana que va de mal en peor, comienza el autor y prosigue:
					
					  Por supuesto, EE.UU. y sus seguidores imputan a la RPDC la responsabilidad de la situacion de esa zona que llega al borde de guerra.
					
					  Algunas potencias vecinas opinan que tienen la culpa tanto la RPDC como EE.UU.
					
					  Pero, la RPDC insiste fuertemente en que la responsabilidad de la delicada situacion actual recae totalmente sobre EE.UU. y sus satelites.
					
					  Hace falta examinar con serenidad cual criterio es correcto y cual es el injusto.
					
					  Para ello, hay que tomar en cuenta los siguientes puntos:
					
					  Primero, es necesario averiguar la causa historica de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana que se hizo tan grave como ahora.
					
					  El agravamiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, zona mas candente del mundo, comenzo desde que EE.UU. y otras potencias dividieron a Corea en dos partes cuando se puso fin a la Segunda Guerra Mundial.
					
					  Corea no es un pais criminal ni derrotado en la guerra como Alemania o Japon.
					
					  Sin embargo, EE.UU. ocupo ilegalmente la mitad del territorio coreano al inventar la barrera artificial, demarcacion militar fijada a sus caprichos en el paralelo 38, en contra de la aspiracion del pueblo coreano a la nueva sociedad y la nueva vida.
					
					  Luego, fabrico el poder titere formado por sus lacayos surcoreanos y les instigo a las provocaciones militares contra la parte connacional.
					
					  Al fin y al cabo, desato la guerra de agresion al Norte (de Corea) junto con los titeres surcoreanos y expuso sin escrupulos su siniestra intencion de usar la bomba atomica.
					
					  En lugar de sacar las lecciones de su gran derrota en la pasada guerra coreana, introdujo en el tiempo posbelico en suelo surcoreano decenas de miles de efectivos agresores y miles de artefactos nucleares que acechan la oportunidad de agredir de nuevo al Norte.
					
					Asi EE.UU. se gano el estigma de autor que empujo a la RPDC a poseer el arma nuclear y de Estado belicista que llevo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana a la coyuntura de tension permanente.
					
					Segundo, hay que observar atentamente desde la posicion objetiva e imparcial las circunstancias que acontecen ahora en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Han venido perdurando durante varias decadas la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. contra Pyongyang.
					
					Bajo tal circunstancia, el pueblo coreano se vio obligado a optar el camino de construccion de fuerzas armadas nucleares para la autodefensa.
					
					Entonces, es EE.UU. el que obligo a la RPDC a tomar medidas intransigentes, inclusive examinar el proyecto del fuego de asedio sobre la isla Guam.
					
					A pesar de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana que se dirige a la fase de explosion, el imperio americano realiza desde el dia 21 junto con los belicistas militares surcoreanos el entrenamiento militar "Ulji Freedom Guardian" contra la RPDC.
					
					?Estaria acaso EE.UU. con brazos cruzados si la RPDC frecuentara en sus narices tales ejercicios militares de gran dimension movilizando los medios estrategicos nucleares?
					
					Tercero, vale la pena observar con ojos bien abiertos los actos injustos que se cometen en la arena internacional en cuanto al problema de la Peninsula Coreana, tema que enfoca la atencion mundial.
					
					Cuando EE.UU. dice que la RPDC vulnera la seguridad regional con sus nuevas "provocaciones" tales como la prueba nuclear y el lanzamiento de misil, la ONU y otros escenarios internacionales repiten literalmente ese criterio y se apresuran a aprobar las resoluciones de sancion, sin hacer referencia alguna a la arriba mencionada causa historica de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana y a las circunstancias actuales.
					
					Para colmo, hasta algunos paises vecinos, que en el pasado exponian dignamente sus posiciones en la ONU manteniendo criterios propios, se arrodillaron ante EE.UU. acobardados ante su despotismo y fanfarroneria. 
					
					Se queda fresco todavia el hecho historico que relata como esos paises iniciaron el desarrollo de arma nuclear sin poder aguantar mas el despotismo, la presion y el maltrato de EE.UU., que les amenazaba con el mismo artefacto, y cuan caro lo han pagado.
					
					Un pais vecino habia dicho que se debe realizar el gran deseo de tener la "bomba atomica, la de hidrogeno y el satelite artificial" aunque tenga que empenar los pantalones y sobreviva la mitad de cientos de millones de su poblacion.
					
					Cuando ese pais transitaba ese camino de martirios bajo la tremenda presion del Occidente, incluso EE.UU., la RPDC le ha enviado el apoyo y respaldo enteros.
					
					Olvidadizas de ello, las potencias vecinas obstaculizan paso a paso el incremento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de caracter autodefensivo de la RPDC frente al chantaje y amenaza nucleares provenientes de EE.UU. 
					
					Para colmo, se suman sin vacilacion alguna a la sancion y presion de EE.UU. contra la RPDC.
					
					Es la conducta que carece totalmente del decoro, la conciencia y la obligacion moral.
					
					Estaria de mas explicar largo que la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana se torna mas delicada debido a la conducta injusta de los gigantes vecinos que se rinden y hasta se suman al despotismo de EE.UU. y la ONU que no vacila en fabricar el documento criminal anticoreano faltando a la objetividad y la imparcialidad e invirtiendo lo injusto en lo justo.
					
					Cualquier hombre, que tenga la vision clara sobre la verdad, podra juzgar donde hay la responsabilidad de empeoramiento de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y cual es el correcto entre diferentes criterios al respecto.
					
					Insinua muchas cosas la miserable situacion de EE.UU. que se cayo en la trampa propia al cabo de su inutil campana de aplastamiento anti-RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. continua con el juego al azar sin sacar la leccion de ello, no se le dara otro resultado que caerse mas hondo en el abismo de arruinamiento tragico.
					
					Las fuerzas seguidoras a EE.UU. no deben pensar que eso es el destino ajeno.
					
					Seria bueno para EE.UU. y sus satelites actuar con prudencia justipreciando la corriente de la epoca actual.
